siteMetadata.title: Creatures 👹🛴
siteMetadata.description: A blog about the open source business project - Creatures  .

node.excerpt: Bird, Limes, bah! How hard can it be to create a scooter share? 😁 The idea behind  Creatures  is to see what it takes to start up a company…
A ongoing sequential log of project steps Write down ideas for app Start researching creating an android app and options for embedded device…
